Some great apps and tools to help you manage your money

A bunch of links and descriptions of what all the tools do. 22seven Luno Other PFMs (gross) Shyft

The Capitec app is pretty good for day to day budgeting, but you can’t keep track of other things with it. Pretty good if you’re starting out and bank with Capitec though.

PFM tools My Financial Life YNAB 22seven Pastel MyMoney BudgetBuddy JamJar

this ratio tool is kind of cool - I could replicate and improve on it https://www.capitecbank.co.za/bankbetterlivebetter/financial-tools/budgeting-tool
